channel.title: Making Dark Bow shoot... Dodian
channel.description:
I added everything needed to make it shoot, I took a bow that shoots and searched it in client.java and item.java and added an line for dark bow on same places and it just wont shoot! I am starting to give up!
Here is the tut i followed:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,226892.0.html
And it doesen't work for me, I did everything in it and it still doesent work... Thats dodian for me!

item.title: Making Dark Bow shoot... Dodian
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Myself, I just replaced Magic Longbow with Dark bow, then Added Darkbow in Constants.java under Shortbows.

Read full topic
